Name: Spitfire
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
15 ml Egg white (pasteurised) or 																																			Aquafaba (chickpea water)																								 or 3 dashes Fee Brothers Fee Foam cocktail foamer
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon zest twist.
EXPRESS lemon zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: A brandy sour with a splash of dry white wine.
History: Created in 2006 by Tony Conigliaro at Shochu Lounge, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Spitfire contains 207 calories
